title: Concept Mapping-Based Nursing Learning Approach Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing theories and practical experience in clinical settings
context.additional_context: Deep Learning Strategy Development Using Concept Maps for Learners in Nursing Manager/Leader Roles

learning_goals: Learners can systematically connect nursing-related concepts using concept mapping techniques.
Learners enhance deep learning abilities by analyzing clinical cases through concept maps.
Learners can transition their learning approach from surface learning to deep learning.

resources: Digital Concept Mapping Tool (e.g., Coggle, Miro)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
